fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: **Abyssal Control** - Choose up to three players each night. The first will be controlled to the second, the second to the third, and the third to the first.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Advocate of the Vengeful** - You may speak to the dead at night. You will appear to be the (60) Medium. All Unseen members gain one use of their ability while dead, and may speak in the factional chat. This attribute still applies when you are dead.
- Roleblock and Redirect Immune
